title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: Experience city living in this charming & sun-filled Townhome
description:
Available Now for rent in Queen Village. Experience city living in this charming & sun-filled Townhome located in Queen Village featuring 3 bedrooms & 1 1/2 bathrooms. Arrive home to an open floor plan ideal for entertaining family & friends. You will be delighted with the open floor plan for the living room and dining, recessed lighting & hardwood floors on the first & second floor. The beautiful eat-in kitchen is equipped with Refrigerator, Microwave Oven, Range, Hood & Dishwasher with plenty of cabinetry for storage & countertops for creating your culinary delights. Added bonus of first floor 1/2 bathroom. Access provided to the spacious rear yard from the kitchen. The patio is a wonderful space for grilling and relaxing. The first floor is graced with original hardwood flooring and the second floor of the home is naturally filled with sunlight. Second floor features 3 spacious bedrooms plus 1 full bathroom. The bathroom is beautifully updated & offers a tub/shower combination and vanity. Access to the basement provides plenty of storage. There is a laundry which includes washer and dryer. The home was recently renovated in the last 2 years and offers newer plumbing, electric, HVAC to include Central Air Conditioning. Prime location in desirable Queen Village neighborhood. Daily errands do not require a car as this is a walker’s paradise. With an amazing Walk Score of 98, Transit Score of 70 & Bike Score of 81. You will enjoy living in this home & will appreciate all of amenities that that neighborhood has to offer. Just moments to Meredith, venture to nearby Shots Tower coffee, Weccacoe playground, Mario Lanza park, restaurants along E Passyunk Ave & South St Super easy access to Delaware Ave, Old City, Ben Franklin Bridge & I-95. Easy access to nearby shopping; Target, Home Depot, TJ Maxx & Home Goods, Acme Market all along Delaware Ave. First month rent, last month rent and security deposit is required. Tenant is responsible for all utilities.

description:
One-of-a-kind dramatic sun-filled home with towering ceilings, exposed brick and covered garage parking on a virtually hidden block in the historic Society Hill section of Philadelphia. This home features three levels of living with a massive living room, half bath, dining room and full kitchen conveniently located on the first floor. Following the exposed brick and sun drenched stairs up to the second level opens you to your first two bedrooms, laundry, and first full bathroom. Your master is revealed to you after a long private corridor greeting you with his and hers full bathroom with walk-in closet and tremendous shower room. The third floor features a romantic full floor fourth bedroom option with exposed beams and unprecedented privacy. Those of you who enjoy walkability, shops and a nightlife you can leave at the club will love the accessibility this home offers. Being footsteps away from some of the best restaurants, cafes and farmers markets this home allows you to enjoy the finer things the city has to offer. Highlights of the neighborhood include, The Twisted Tail, Bloomsday Café, Bistro Romano. In the mood for something else? title: Two professional guys looking for a third roommate in our house
description:
Hi there!
We are two professional guys in our late twenties looking for a third roommate in our house! We like to have fun, !!!playing video games, watching shows, social drinking, working out, and going with the flow. We both work hybrid schedules for work. You can have friends/sigs over but, no house parties. This is a drug-free house, and doesn’t permit smoking cigarettes on the premises. While we love cats and dogs to death, we are not allowing any. We’re very clean and respectful of one another and are looking for a roommate that shares these qualities. No couples.The house: The house was built a couple decades ago, but has been updated on the inside! We have a ton of space inside on the 2nd and 3rd floor. title: Washington Square West Condo with PARKING
description:
Welcome home! This Washington Square West top floor, end unit, 2 br / 1 ba condo is packed full of amenities, including one gated, reserved PARKING space on site. As you enter you'll see the convenient coat rack on your left. Move into the spacious living room and notice light pouring in from the large balcony overlooking South Street. The large, eat-in kitchen is opposite the dining area and open to the living area. There is plenty of storage as well a modern dishwasher, range and oven and full size refrigerator. As you move through the hallway towards the bedrooms there is a full bath on the left and a spacious storage / utility closet on the right. Each bedroom is large enough to fit a queen sized bed and the larger bedroom has a walk-in closet. Unlike some other homes in Philadelphia, the in-unit washer and dryer are modern, functional and reliable. Concrete between the floors means you never hear your neighbors. Central air and heat with a smart thermostat will keep you ridiculously comfortable without ridiculously high utility costs. The smart door lock opens with a code or your fingerprint and can be locked and unlocked from anywhere over the internet.
The building has two large shared courtyards that are perfect for a summer barbecue.
The location is amazing! One block from the Broad Street Line, two blocks from Whole Foods and Acme and a short walk to Segar park, with a well-maintained playground, one of the best dog parks in the city, and tennis and basketball courts that are currently being re-done. Dozens of restaurants and bars are within walking distance and almost everything not within walking distance is accessible by transit.
Cats and dogs (including large breeds) welcome!
Available November 1st.
This home can be rented without parking for $2,100/month.
Don't miss out - apply today!
Owner pays water, tenant responsible for all other utilities. No smoking. First, last and security to move in.

title: Beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington!
description:
WELCOME HOME to this beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington! The living and dining areas offer dramatic ten foot high ceilings, Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, and oversized windows that fill the home with natural light. The kitchen with breakfast bar features Poggenpohl cabinets, stainless steel appliances, Kohler fixtures, and Capao Bonito granite countertops. The bedroom features a double door closet and is set across from the spacious spa-like bathroom, which boasts White Gioia marble tile flooring, chrome fixtures, and a ceramic sink with storage vanity. Included in the rent are central air and heating, water and sewer, 24 hour concierge, private fitness center, and club room. Valet parking is available next door in a public garage. Perfectly situated in the Rittenhouse and Avenue of the Arts area, this home is steps away from fine dining, one-of-a kind shopping, world-renowned cultural destinations and exciting nightlife.
